text: The Night of the Iguana is a 1964 American drama movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1961 play of the same name by Tennessee Williams. It stars Richard Burton, Elizabeth Taylor, Ava Gardner, Deborah Kerr, Sue Lyon, Grayson Hall, Cyril Delevanti and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It won an Academy Award in 1965 and was nominated for 3 others. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: The Night of the Iguana (movie)
